title: Riot stole my ward skin
body: I got this ward skin shard from hextech crafting called "Loot_ ward skin 16 " or some shit like that. it looked quite badass so i decided to upgrade it with my essences. After doing so it said that it had been added to my loot or w/e. I checked in game and I couldn't find it pre game lobby where it asks you to select your skin. I did lose my essence for it and my hextech chest. Please do something about it. Tried to send a ticket but the system won't let me log in cuz racism

replies.body: We're aware of some issues where specific wards are not selectable in champ select. We're investigating into it but at the moment there's no fix or workaround. I can't estimate a time when a fix will roll out, but please let me know if you have any other questions.

In the interest of saving everyone some time., the affected ward skins can still be unlocked/shown via hextech, however they will have wierd names, and if you unlock them, they will not show up in your inventory, that is however a purely cosmetic error, so the player still own the skin even if they can't see it.

Over on EU I have a single case where a player had chosen one of the affected wards when this issue began, and as a result the button/option where you can change wards actually disappeared.

> ''Greetings XXXXXXXX
> 
> You can rest assured the ward skin is in your account, it is visible in our system, but there is a small visual issue right now and this is why you are unable to select it. We are working on a fix to make the wards skins selectable again.
> 
> Terribly sorry for this inconvenience and please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with. ^_^
> 
> Have a nice day!
> 
> Best regards,
> XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
> Riot Games Player Support''
